reporter_caption.center: PAINESVILLE TWP. BD. OF TRUSTEES v. PAINESVILLE, 84 Ohio St.3d 1451 (1998)

caption.center: Painesville Twp. Bd. of Trustees v. Painesville.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Lake App. No. 97-L-090.
opinion.opinion_text:
Reported at 83 Ohio St.3d 1475, 701 N.E.2d 381. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.
MOYER, C.J., PFEIFER and LUNDBERG STRATTON, JJ., dissent.
